# protocol

**Instance Property**

The manner in which the system applies your app’s device discovery extension.

## Declaration

```swift
var `protocol`: DDDevice.Protocol { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value is [doc://com.apple.devicediscoveryextension/documentation/DeviceDiscoveryExtension/DDDevice/Protocol-swift.enum/dial] for the discovery of third-party media receivers.

## Indicating the protocol

- **DDDevice.Protocol**: An identifier for the manner in which an app interacts with a device.
- **protocolType**: A custom universal type that describes the device’s manner of communication with the extension.
- **bluetoothIdentifier**: An identifier to communicate with the device through Bluetooth wireless technology.
- **networkEndpoint**: An object that describes a local-network device.
